title: Behind the Cryptocurrency Bubble
description:
The cryptocurrency party is over. Bitcoin tumbled to a 13-month low this week, fueling a sell-off among rival tokens. David Meyers speaks with Bloomberg's Joe Weisenthal on the backstory of the crypto craze and where it goes from here. 
FOLLOW UP
 Joe's latest report: A Former Blockchain Believer Explains Why It Will Never Benefit Corporations
You can follow Joe at: @TheStalwart 
----
 TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
